00056   char *line_read = 0;
00057 
00058   char *rl_gets () {
00059 
00060     if (line_read) {
00061       free (line_read);
00062       line_read = (char *)NULL;
00063     }
00064 
00065     /* Get a line from the user. */
00066     line_read = readline ("dfsclient> ");
00067 
00068     /* If the line has any text in it, save it on the history. */
00069     if (line_read && *line_read)
00070       add_history (line_read);
00071 
00072     return line_read;
00073   }

00075   const char *usage[] = {
00076     "usage: dfsclient [OPTIONS]",
00077     "",
00078     "OPTIONS:",
00079     "  --config=<file>  Read configuration from <file>.  The default config file is",
00080     "                   \"conf/hypertable.cfg\" relative to the toplevel install directory",
00081     "  --eval <cmds>    Evaluates the commands in the string <cmds>.  Several commands can",
00082     "                   be supplied in <cmds> by separating them with semicolons",
00083     "  --help           Display this help text and exit",
00084     ""
00085     "This is a command line interface to the DFS broker.",
00086     (const char *)0
00087   };

00092   class ConnectionHandler : public DispatchHandler {
00093   public:
00094 
00095     ConnectionHandler() : m_notified(false), m_connected(false) { return; }
00096   
00097     virtual void handle(EventPtr &event_ptr) {
00098       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00099       m_notified = true;
00100       if (event_ptr->type == Event::CONNECTION_ESTABLISHED)
00101         m_connected = true;
00102       else if (event_ptr->type == Event::ERROR) {
00103         HT_ERRORF("%s", event_ptr->toString().c_str());
00104       }
00105       else if (event_ptr->type == Event::MESSAGE) {
00106         HT_ERRORF("%s", event_ptr->toString().c_str()); 
00107       }
00108       m_cond.notify_one();
00109     }
00110 
00111     bool wait_for_notification() {
00112       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00113       if (m_notified)
00114         return m_connected;
00115       m_cond.wait(lock);
00116       return m_connected;
00117     }
00118 
00119   private:
00120     boost::mutex m_mutex;
00121     boost::condition m_cond;
00122     bool m_notified;
00123     bool m_connected;
00124   };
00125 }

00132 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00133   int error;
00134   const char *line;
00135   char *eval = 0;
00136   size_t i;
00137   string config_file = "";
00138   vector<InteractiveCommand *>  commands;
00139   Comm *comm;
00140   DfsBroker::Client *client;
00141   PropertiesPtr props_ptr;
00142   ConnectionHandler *conn_handler = new ConnectionHandler();
00143   DispatchHandlerPtr handler_ptr = conn_handler;
00144 
00145   System::initialize(argv[0]);
00146   ReactorFactory::initialize((uint16_t)System::get_processor_count());
00147 
00148   for (int i=1; i<argc; i++) {
00149     if (!strncmp(argv[i], "--config=", 9))
00150       config_file = &argv[i][9];
00151     else if (!strcmp(argv[i], "--eval")) {
00152       i++;
00153       if (i == argc)
00154         Usage::dump_and_exit(usage);
00155       eval = argv[i];
00156     }
00157     else
00158       Usage::dump_and_exit(usage);
00159   }
00160 
00161   if (config_file == "")
00162     config_file = System::installDir + "/conf/hypertable.cfg";
00163 
00164   props_ptr = new Properties( config_file );
00165 
00166   comm = new Comm();
00167 
00168   {
00169     const char *host;
00170     uint16_t port;
00171     struct sockaddr_in addr;
00172 
00173     if ((port = (uint16_t)props_ptr->get_int("DfsBroker.Port", 0)) == 0) {
00174       HT_ERRORF("DfsBroker.Port property not found in config file '%s'", config_file.c_str());
00175       return 1;
00176     }
00177 
00178     if ((host = props_ptr->get("DfsBroker.Host", (const char *)0)) == 0) {
00179       HT_ERRORF("DfsBroker.Host property not found in config file '%s'", config_file.c_str());
00180       return 1;
00181     }
00182 
00183     InetAddr::initialize(&addr, host, port);
00184 
00185     if ((error = comm->connect(addr, handler_ptr)) != Error::OK) {
00186       HT_ERRORF("Problem connecting to DfsBroker - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00187       return 1;
00188     }
00189 
00190     if (!conn_handler->wait_for_notification()) {
00191       cout << "Unable to connect to DfsBroker." << endl << flush;
00192       return 1;
00193     }
00194     client = new DfsBroker::Client(comm, addr, 15);
00195   }
00196 
00197   commands.push_back( new CommandCopyFromLocal(client) );
00198   commands.push_back( new CommandCopyToLocal(client) );
00199   commands.push_back( new CommandLength(client) );
00200   commands.push_back( new CommandMkdirs(client) );
00201   commands.push_back( new CommandRemove(client) );
00202   commands.push_back( new CommandRmdir(client) );
00203   commands.push_back( new CommandShutdown(client) );
00204   commands.push_back( new CommandExists(client) );
00205 
00209   if (eval != 0) {
00210     const char *str;
00211     std::string commandStr;
00212     str = strtok(eval, ";");
00213     while (str) {
00214       commandStr = str;
00215       boost::trim(commandStr);
00216       for (i=0; i<commands.size(); i++) {
00217         if (commands[i]->matches(commandStr.c_str())) {
00218           commands[i]->parse_command_line(commandStr.c_str());
00219           if (commands[i]->run() != Error::OK)
00220             return 1;
00221           break;
00222         }
00223       }
00224       if (i == commands.size()) {
00225         HT_ERRORF("Unrecognized command : %s", commandStr.c_str());
00226         return 1;
00227       }
00228       str = strtok(0, ";");      
00229     }
00230     return 0;
00231   }
00232 
00233   cout << "Welcome to dsftool, a command-line interface to the DFS broker." << endl;
00234   cout << "Type 'help' for a description of commands." << endl;
00235   cout << endl << flush;
00236 
00237   using_history();
00238   while ((line = rl_gets()) != 0) {
00239 
00240     if (*line == 0)
00241       continue;
00242 
00243     for (i=0; i<commands.size(); i++) {
00244       if (commands[i]->matches(line)) {
00245         commands[i]->parse_command_line(line);
00246         commands[i]->run();
00247         break;
00248       }
00249     }
00250 
00251     if (i == commands.size()) {
00252       if (!strcmp(line, "quit") || !strcmp(line, "exit"))
00253         exit(0);
00254       else if (!strcmp(line, "help")) {
00255         cout << endl;
00256         for (i=0; i<commands.size(); i++) {
00257           Usage::dump(commands[i]->usage());
00258           cout << endl;
00259         }
00260       }
00261       else
00262         cout << "Unrecognized command." << endl;
00263     }
00264 
00265   }
00266 
00267   return 0;
00268 }
